FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: Find answers to common questions about our services and solutions

Q1.TITLE: What services do you offer?
Q1.ANSWER: We offer a wide range of services including web development, mobile app development, UI/UX design, and backend development. Our team specializes in creating custom solutions tailored to your specific needs.

Q2.TITLE: How long does it take to complete a project?
Q2.ANSWER: Project timelines vary depending on the scope and complexity. We typically complete small projects in 2-4 weeks, medium projects in 1-3 months, and large projects in 3-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

Q3.TITLE: What technologies do you use?
Q3.ANSWER: We use modern technologies including Angular, React, Node.js, Python, and various databases. Our team stays up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

Q4.TITLE: How do you handle project pricing?
Q4.ANSWER: We offer flexible pricing models based on project requirements. We can work on a fixed-price basis for well-defined projects or on a time-and-materials basis for more complex, evolving projects. We'll provide a detailed quote after understanding your needs.

Q5.TITLE: Do you provide ongoing support?
Q5.ANSWER: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance services. This includes regular updates, bug fixes, performance optimization, and technical support. We can customize a support package based on your specific needs.

FEED_BACK.section_description: We believe that great work speaks through client satisfaction. Here are some words from our partners about their experience working with us and the websites we created for them.
FEED_BACK.globestone_feedback: We thank Sinwar Company for professionally developing our website. It clearly reflects our business in the natural stone industry and provides a smooth, user-friendly experience for our clients.
FEED_BACK.academia_feedback: Our experience with Sinwar Company was excellent. They designed our academic website in a modern and user-friendly way, making it easier for our clients to explore our services.
FEED_BACK.jahbaz_feedback: We appreciate Sinwar Company for designing the Jahbaz Academy platform. The layout is clean and effective, making it easy for learners to access the content effortlessly.
